item.title: About Danijel
item.description: A dynamic technology professional with 20+ years of experience in software development, product management, project management, user experience design, and content strategy. Proven successes in delivering projects with multimillion-dollar budgets, coordinating resources, and driving development strategy throughout the software development lifecycle. Skilled at developing and nurturing relationships with developers, product managers, and project managers, and helping with vendors and key stakeholders. Accomplished in analyzing data and drawing customer insights from it.
